ai-patthana8.37:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.37:1.1_0: mind associated with the mind, no cause or conditioned by mind.
ai-patthana8.37:1.1_1: or mind associated with the mind. ...
ai-patthana8.37:2.1_0: you shouldn’t make a new conditions for nine projects.
ai-patthana8.37:3.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
